p: This modern two piece sectional is expertly handcrafted and upholstered in 100% genuine top grain leather. With attention to detail, excellent workmanship is shown on the stitching around the sectional. It features two powered reclining seats with multiple headrest adjustments.Â This sectional is perfect for a contemporary home and will accent your decorative pieces beautifully. Stainless steel legs are added for maximum support.Â
